TC_SB_MAR_SALES_ME_KLV_IMP_TRK_2.title: Klaviyo
TC_SB_MAR_SALES_ME_KLV_IMP_TRK_2.subtitle: Klaviyo is an email marketing platform created for online businesses - featuring powerful email and SMS marketing automation - to help them acquire, retain and grow their customers.
TC_SB_MAR_SALES_ME_KLV_IMP_TRK_2.description: By enabling web tracking on your website, you can collect helpful information around your customers' and orders' activities.
TC_SB_MAR_SALES_ME_KLV_IMP_TRK_2.description2: Follow this guideline to get started with Klaviyo campaigns and flows.
